mapper.insert: insert into user (account, password, salt, phone, created_time, updated_time, version) values (#{account},#{password},#{salt},#{phone},#{createdTime},#{updatedTime},#{version});
mapper.select: select account, password, salt, phone, created_time, updated_time, version from user where account = #{loginName} or phone = #{loginName};
select account, password, salt, phone, created_time, updated_time, version from user where account = #{account} or phone = #{phone};
